Summary: WHILE DRIVING 55-60 MPH THE TREAD SEPARATED ON THE FRONT LEFT TIRE, TIRE SIZE P235/75/R15, MILEAGE 5,000.  THE TIRE WAS NOT ORIGINAL MANUFACTURER EQUIPMENT.    *NLM  CONSUMER STATED CASING WAS DEFECTIVE, WHICH CAUSED TREAD TO SEPARATE, CAUSED BODY DAMAGE AND LOSS OF CONTROL OF VEHICLE.*SLC
LEFT REAR WHEEL CAME OFF WHILE DRIVING (OHIO TRAFFIC CRASH REPORT).   *MJS
DRIVING 50 MPH SHIFTED FRON 2ND TO 3RD GEAR TRANSMISSION LOCKED UP, VEHICLE LOST CONTROL, RESULTING IN COLLISION/INJURIES.  TT
LEFT REAR WHEEL FELL OFF, CAUSING ACCIDENT. (NEW JERSEY STATE POLICE REPORT) *DH

I HAVE A TIRE ON A CAR I RECENTLY BOUGHT THAT I BELIEVE IS DEFECTIVE. IT IS ON A SHOW CAR. NONE OF THE OTHER TIRES HAVE THE SAME ISSUE AS THIS TIRE. THE TREAD PATTERN IS UNEVEN AND ODD SHAPED COMPARED TO ALL OF THE OTHER TREAD IN ONE SPOT AND THE TIRE IS UNBALANCED AND HAS SEVERAL BULGES IN IT. I HAVE CONTACTED THE COMPANY AND I AM GETTING THE RUN AROUND, THEY JUST FLAT OUT DON'T WANT TO ADMIT THAT THE TIRE IS MISMANUFACTURED. I DON'T BELIEVE IT IS AN EXPENSIVE TIRE, HOWEVER, I AM CONCERNED ABOUT THE QUALITY OF THE TIRE AND THE SAFETY OF ANYONE THAT MAY HAVE THEM. I DO BELIEVE THE TIRE MAY BE AN OLDER TIRE, BUT SINCE IT IS ON A SHOW CAR IS IS RARELY DRIVEN. WE CAUGHT THE DEFECT BEFORE THERE WAS A FAILURE, THANKFULLY.  I HAVE MANY PICTURES OF THE TIRE FROM ALL ANGLES SHOWING THE ISSUES. I SENT THEM TO THE COMPANY AS WELL.

THE LEFT FRONT TIRE SEPARATED CAUSING THE CONSUMER TO LOSE CONTROL OVER THE VEHICLE AND CRASH INTO A GUARD RAIL, RESULTING IN INJURY TO THE CONSUMER (NO MAKE/MODEL OF TIRE PROVIDED) (OHIO TRAFFIC CRASH REPORT).    *MJS
